extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN202 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.

basic.description: This course's aim is threefold: to improve students' comprehension and production of oral and written German through practice in reading, writing, listening and speaking; to increase their knowledge of contemporary issues in Germany, with a special focus on transnational perspectives; and to better their analytic skills and media literacy
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: Contemporary Germany through Media and News
